items.title: Ver 1.1.1 Release Notes
items.author: HoloearthWebsiteAdmin
items.content:
This is the Holoearth Management Team.

Holoearth was updated on October 28th, 2025. Update Contents

An issue where passive skill effects such as “Action Skill Attack Power Up” for the action skills “Soaring Slash,” “Heat Slash,” “Mizuchi,” “Wind Slash,” and “Frost Edge” were not applied properly in the Simulation Room was fixed.

■ Bug causing items inside storage furniture to disappear An issue where items stored inside furniture that can hold items, such as chests and furnaces, disappeared when the furniture was deconstructed in the Simulation Room and My Room was fixed.

We sincerely apologize to all users for the inconvenience caused by the recent issue where items placed in furniture could be lost. We will be offering data recovery support for users who lost items due to this issue and wish to have their play data restored.

If you would like your data to be recovered, please contact us via the Holoearth inquiry form within the period stated below.

Data recovery request period:

For any account that contacts us about data recovery, we will restore (roll back) the play data of the Simulation Room / My Room to the state it was in just before the Ver. 1.1.0 update implemented on October 23rd, 2025.

Room play data that can be recovered:・Simulation Room ・My Room

: Other: User data restoration: Specify the play data of the room you wish to have restored: Simulation Room, My Room, or both.

■ The entrance will be updated to a new area, Focal Square.

A large monitor in the center will showcase a holonatsu highlight video.

What will be mirrored: ・Avatar model ・Location ・Item usage

Applicable areas: ・Focal Square ・Celestial Arena

2. The talent model will not be shown when sitting at a Poker Room table.

Previous Requirements ▼Minimum requirements

Processor : Intel® Core i5 or equivalent Memory : 8GB

▼Recommended requirements OS : Windows 10 64-bit or higher i7 8700 or equivalent Memory : 16GB

The following issues have been confirmed following maintenance and will be fixed with the next update. We apologize for the inconvenience caused.

■ Passive Skill Bug (Added October 24, 2025) In the Simulation Room, there is a bug where passive skill effects such as “Action Skill Attack Power Up” for the action skills “Soaring Slash,” “Heat Slash,” “Mizuchi,” “Wind Slash,” and “Frost Edge” are not being applied properly.

■ Bug causing items inside storage furniture to disappear (Added October 24, 2025) In the Simulation Room and My Room, there is a bug where items stored inside furniture that can hold items, such as chests and furnaces, to disappear when the furniture is deconstructed.

When deconstructing these furniture items, be sure to take out all items stored inside beforehand.
